title: As you Like it
description:
Hirokuni 2nd year of university student now living with his beautiful step mother Fujino Konomi (33) after his father died in accident. He has keep his feeling for long time to prevent anyone know but he accidentally told someone about it when he drunk during circle meeting... 

Tags: big breasts, stockings, sole male, incest, tankoubon, milf, threesome, story arc, mother, inseki, widow
